body.p: The assets and liabilities of the legal acquiree are measured and recognised in the consolidated financial statements at their pre‑combination carrying amounts (see paragraph B22(a)). Therefore, in a reverse acquisition the non‑controlling interest reflects the non‑controlling shareholders’ proportionate interest in the pre‑combination carrying amounts of the legal acquiree’s net assets even if the non‑controlling interests in other acquisitions are measured at their fair value at the acquisition date.
